text.en: Namo guru!
text.en-trans: namo guru

text.en: Master of the activity of all the victorious ones and their heirs,
text.en-trans: gyalwa sé ché kün gyi trinlé dak

text.en: Single embodiment of threefold knowledge, love and power,
text.en-trans: khyen tsé nü sum chik tu düpé zuk

text.en: Great holder of the deep blue crown of Akṣobhya,
text.en-trans: mi kyö tönting chö pen changwa ché

text.en: Glorious Karmapa, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: palden karma pa la solwa deb

text.en: Secret treasury of all the tathāgatas,
text.en-trans: dezhin shekpa kün gyi sangwé dzö

text.en: Whose character is the pervasive vajra of space,
text.en-trans: khakhyab kha yi dorjé daknyi chen

text.en: Perfectly awakened buddha in human form,
text.en-trans: dzokpé sangye mi yi zukdzin pa

text.en: Rangjung Takpé Dorje, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: rangjung takpé dorjér solwa deb

text.en: With command of a vast ocean of wisdom,
text.en-trans: yeshe gyatso ché la wangjor zhing

text.en: Through oceanic activity, until saṃsāra is empty,
text.en-trans: trinlé gyatsö khorwa matongwar

text.en: You fully ripen an ocean of sentient beings,
text.en-trans: semchen gyatso yongsu minpar jé

text.en: Lhenkyé Dewé Dorje, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: lhenkyé dewé dorjér solwa deb

text.en: Whoever prays to you receives blessings there and then.
text.en-trans: gangla soldeb dé la der jin lob

text.en: Your compassion is unobstructed, like lightning in the sky.
text.en-trans: tukjé tokmé namkhé lok tar nyur

text.en: You are inseparable from the protector Avalokiteśvara,
text.en-trans: gönpo chenrezik dang yer mi jé

text.en: All-pervasive sovereign, Karmapa, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: khyabdak karma pa la solwa deb

text.en: Upon the field of my devoted body, speech and mind,
text.en-trans: dak gi go sum depé zhingsa ru

text.en: Shower down the rain of the glorious guru’s blessings.
text.en-trans: palden lamé jinlab char gyün beb

text.en: Upon the burgeoning shoots of my awakening mind,
text.en-trans: changchub sem kyi nyugu minpé tser

text.en: Let ripen the excellent fruit of the guru’s four kāyas.
text.en-trans: lama ku zhi dré zang minpar shok

text.en: In all my lives, may the glorious Karmapa,
text.en-trans: tserab küntu palden karma pé

text.en: His feet gracing an immaculate white lotus,
text.en-trans: zhab sen duldral pema karpo dé

text.en: Adorn the chakra, Brahma’s abode, at my crown,
text.en-trans: tsang né khorlö gyen du tobpa dang

text.en: And grant empowerment through the transference of wisdom realization.
text.en-trans: yeshe gonggyü powé wangkur tsol

text.en: Through the power of bringing to mind your three secrets,1
text.en-trans: gang gi sang sum yi la jepé tü

text.en: May I gain the splendour of a ripened and liberated mind,
text.en-trans: dak gyü min ching drolwé pal tob né

text.en: And, through emulating activity that is as infinite as space,
text.en-trans: trinlé mizé namkhé jé drowé

text.en: Auspiciously bring vast benefit to the teachings and beings.
text.en-trans: ten drö dön chen drubpé tashi shok
